des:
Use your Alexa device to manage the Tenki thermostats directly by voice.
The Tenki-HVAC skill supports the following features:
- Turning the thermostat on and off
- Setting of heating or cooling mode
- Reading the room temperature
- Setting the setpoint temperature

To get started, activate the skill from the Amazon Alexa app and connect to the Tenki account (the same used in the Tenki-HVAC app).
From the Amazon Alexa app, search for your Smart Home Thermostat device and configure it as you prefer.
The default name of your thermostat will be the same you use in the Tenki-HVAC app.
Of course, it is possible to add the device to an Alexa group, such as "Beach house" or "Bedrooms".

Once you know the name or group name of your thermostat, you can ask Alexa:
"Alexa, turn on the Living Room thermostat"
"Alexa, set Living Room temperature to 71"
"Alexa, decrease Living Room temperature by 2 degrees"
"Alexa, what is the Living Room temperature?"
"Alexa, what is the Living Room set to?"
